Package org.ops4j.peaberry.internal

Class Summary
LeasedServiceRegistry Provides a Leased ServiceRegistry.
NonDelegatingClassLoaderHook Hook to support Guice inside non-delegating classloader containers like OSGi, where the CGLIB proxy/reflection classes may not be visible to client types.
OSGiServiceRegistry OSGi ServiceRegistry adaptor (proof-of-concept, not optimised)
ServiceBindingFactory BindingFactory that provides on-demand bindings to dynamic services.
ServiceFilterFactory Provide LDAP filters from Service specifications.
ServiceMatcher Provide matchers and other utility methods for Service annotations.
ServiceProviderFactory Provide dynamic Service Providers.
